reviews.text:
Bakerloo line is a disaster. Not only is the train delayed, the departure board is not up to date. I then go on Google for live departures, and that too is not accurate. 
On a separate note, who ever manages the trains in and out of Queens Park, should retire! Needs better management to stop trains with passengers, waiting on the tracks.
A convenient place to change trains but rather a bleak area outside the station.

There are a few different connections to make here to be fair but it is one of the hardest stations to get your head around. It is a real pain to understand well. Be prepared and give yourself a few extra minutes if you are connecting to another journey. This could be a frustrating situation.
Travel to and from there, plus the transition through the station are usually fine, not needing interactions with the station staff.

reviews.author_name: London Thameside Basement Studio Entertainment Lee
reviews.text: This station is simply amazing it’s two station in one with yards and yards of passageways connecting the platforms.Both underground and overground use the station it is a very important station in the network you have trains going from north to south and from east to west.Its very wheelchair friendly with two cafes.
